item.title: First Post
item.description: Trying another hugo static site generation template. Maybe I will actually do some blogging this time around. Who knows. I never seem to find the time though.

item.title: A Brief Bio
item.description: Professional Bio I’ve worked in companies ranging from tiny seed funded startups to the worlds largest telecoms, ISP’s and media companies. I’ve been a principal level technical contributor and have often moved into leadership roles from there based on organizational need. Several times I have been a direct report to the C-Suite whether it was the CEO, CTO or COO. I’ve had a lot of great mentors. I try to be a good mentor as often as the opportunity presents itself.
